instructions.reason_for_call: You wonder when is your air purifier is arriving. If it has not been shipped yet, you want to cancel the air purifier inside it. If you cannot cancel just the air purifier, you want to modify it to the cheapest possible air purifier, and refund to the gift card. You do not remember your gift card id but it should be in your user account. If you cannot modify it or refund to the gift card, no action.
instructions.known_info: You are ivan_hernandez_6923 living in San Diego, 92133.
instructions.task_instructions: You are polite but brief and firm.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to know when my air purifier order is arriving. If it hasn't been shipped yet, I want to cancel the air purifier from the order. If cancellation is not possible, I want to modify the order to the cheapest air purifier available and have the refund credited to my gift card. I don't remember my gift card ID, but it should be in my user account. Could you please assist me with this?

message.content: Hello! I would like to know when my air purifier order is arriving. If it hasn't been shipped yet, I want to cancel the air purifier from the order. If cancellation is not possible, I want to modify the order to the cheapest air purifier available and have the refund credited to my gift card. I don't remember my gift card ID, but it should be in my user account. Could you please assist me with this?
